World-first NZ study: Are baby food pouches really unhealthy for kids? https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/world-first-nz-study-are-baby-food-pouches-really-unhealthy-for-kids/55QW7PB6YFELXKEFJO5HQVFRKI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/world-first-nz-study-are-baby-food-pouches-really-unhealthy-for-kids/55QW7PB6YFELXKEFJO5HQVFRKI/ Jamie MortonNZ researchers test claims baby food pouches are unhealthy – with surprising results. Sun, 03 Nov 2024 16:00:00 +0000 An Otago University study that tracked eating habits among nearly 1000 children found most infants were spoon-fed, and when they did consume food from pouches, they were often seated in high chairs, supervised by an adult.
